function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of isolation room for infected individuals","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the disease within the house","Mitigation":"Create a dedicated isolation room with good indoor air quality and natural lighting, as well as access to the outdoors for sunlight and boredom prevention","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and UV disinfection","People":"Residents of the house","Owner":"Homeowners"},{"Description":"Inadequate sanitation facilities for preventing virus transmission","Impact":"Risk of viruses entering the house and causing infection","Mitigation":"Create a dedicated sanitation room with cleaning facilities for residents and guests before entering the house","Technologies":"Smart disinfection systems, touchless faucets, and antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Residents and guests of the house","Owner":"Homeowners or property managers"},{"Description":"Lack of adaptability and flexibility in house design","Impact":"Inability to accommodate future changes in needs and lifestyle, increasing the risk of obsolescence","Mitigation":"Design the house to be adaptable and flexible to accommodate future changes in lifestyle and needs","Technologies":"Modular furniture, adjustable partitions, and smart home systems","People":"Architects and homeowners","Owner":"Architects and homeowners"}]}
